title: Is it possible to make AspNetCompiler task to produce binary log?
body: This is not a bug, but a question. We use binary logs to troubleshoot all the build issues, but we are in the dark with the AspNetCompiler task. Is there any way to light it up?

nodes.body: I'm not very familiar with it offhand. Can you point me to an example project/solution that uses it?

Hmm, I do not have an example outside of our organisation. But I can provide a binary build log, if there is a secure upload link, that shows how we call it.
Or I can post a command line example from such a binary log.
Any update on this? Any Asp.Net Mvc project with aspx or cshtml files use it. I am not sure about Asp.Net Core, but the Framework version for sure.
